name: One Rotation
description:
This is a demo level of a casual puzzle mini-game. Your goal is to explore the maze and collect gems, finding the super-gem to win. But beware! You will need to jump between spinning wheels to move forward, and only jumping on section "1" is allowed! So be patient and attentive: some wheels may be just out of sync...

Rules:

  • You can jump only from "1" to "1". There is no loosing right now, but you may loose time if jumping unsuccessfully.

Controls:

  • Press space to start the game,
  • Press space to jump,
  • Press space to restart the game.

Collectibles:

  • You can collect gems,
  • There are other objects that may change the environment.

Secret:

  • There is one secret route and a hint on how to pass it.

Credits:

  • Idea, development and art: Nikolay Sargsyan,
  • Keys art: Design vector created by freepik - www.freepik.com, https://www.freepik.com/free-photos-vectors/design,
  • Sounds:
    • Winning (supergem) sound: isteak, fromFreeSound,  https://freesound.org/s/387232
    • Rotation sound: tony_bear, from FreeSound, https://freesound.org/s/274007
    • Gem sound: LittleRobotSoundFactory, from FreeSound, https://freesound.org/s/276098
    • Falling / Replaying sound: SpaceJoe, fromFreeSound, https://freesound.org/s/483654
    • Jumping sound: Juaner_, from FreeSound, https://freesound.org/s/471428
    • Keys sound: MrAuralization, from FreeSound, https://freesound.org/s/158625

Made over the course of 15 hours for the TigerDev Spring 2020 Break Jam
